author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Asmallworld Generates Gross Proceeds Of Approx. CHF 8.3 Mln From Capital Increase
text:
May 30 (Reuters) - Asmallworld AG:
* EQS-ADHOC: ASMALLWORLD AG (SWX: ASWN) COMPLETED SUCCESSFUL PLACEMENT OF 725’000 NEWLY REGISTERED SHARES, GENERATING GROSS PROCEEDS OF APPROX. CHF 8.3 MILLION
* NET PROCEEDS OF CAPITAL INCREASE WILL BE USED TO FINANCE INVESTMENT OR ACQUISITION PROJECTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
